thread.section_title: Templatemonster Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Templatemonster | www.templatemonster.com | 2 of 62
thread.title: S.M. McEachern

author: S.M. McEachern
title: S.M. McEachern
text: I was hesitant to contact Templatemonster because I honestly don't know that much about websites and was afraid that would come through and I'd be taken advantage of. However, Carlos was the perfect sales person for me! He endured all of my newbie questions and helped me decide which services were right for my website. What he did not give me was any hard sales pitches, which I appreciated. I look forward to digging into my project with Templatemonster.
